meanings.definition: A group of organic compounds containing a central stilbene core structure.
meanings.sent1: Researchers are studying the stilbenes in plants for their health benefits.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist explained how stilbenes in grapes can be good for your heart.
meanings.sent3: The stilbenes in the garden seemed to be having a party, protecting the plants.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the stilbenes, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The stilbenes stood out like colorful gems in the chemical structure.

meanings.definition: Stilbenes are commonly found in plants and are known for their antioxidant properties.
meanings.sent1: Many fruits contain stilbenes, which help fight off harmful molecules.
meanings.sent2: The scientist discussed how stilbenes in red wine may promote good health.
meanings.sent3: The stilbenes in the forest were like tiny superheroes protecting the trees.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like stilbenes, preserving the memory in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The stilbenes sparkled in the plant, defending it against damage.
